name: Carrier Global Corporation
description: Carrier Global Corporation is a leading global provider of innovative heating, ventilating, and air conditioning (HVAC), refrigeration, and fire and security solutions. Established in 1915 by Willis Haviland Carrier, the inventor of modern air conditioning, Carrier has been at the forefront of advancements in the comfort and safety of residential, commercial, and industrial spaces. With a commitment to sustainability, Carrier focuses on creating energy-efficient products and solutions that help reduce greenhouse gas emissions. The company operates in various sectors including residential HVAC systems, commercial HVAC solutions, refrigeration systems, and fire and security products. Carrier is dedicated to enhancing the quality of life and comfort for people around the world, offering a wide range of products such as air conditioners, heat pumps, chillers, and smart building technologies. Their innovative approach integrates the latest technology to deliver smart, connected, and sustainable solutions, ensuring optimal performance and reliability. Carrier is headquartered in Palm Beach Gardens, Florida, and operates globally, serving a diverse customer base that values energy efficiency and reliability in climate control.
